title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\Admin\Database\V1\EncryptionConfig
name: EncryptionConfig
description:
Encryption configuration for a Cloud Spanner database.

Generated from protobuf message google.spanner.admin.database.v1.EncryptionConfig

params.name: data

params.name: data.kms_key_name
params.description: The Cloud KMS key to be used for encrypting and decrypting the database. Values are of the form projects/<project>/locations/<location>/keyRings/<key_ring>/cryptoKeys/<kms_key_name>.
